discourse_list.title: [Agenda/Discussion] RWA Onboarding Call #1 - Wednesday, September 30 17:00 UTC

content.content: Dial In Details Time in your local-timezone format: 2020-09-30T17:00:00Z Zoom Call  Passcode:  RWA-WG Agenda Working Group Presentation Progress on the RWA Onboarding Working Group by @SebVentures Discussion on the Centrifuge Model     [Poll] RWA Working Group - Centrifuge Model Governance       Following the signal request to prioritize RWA (which will most likely be accepted on chain). The RWA Working Group have work on a model to onboard RWA, called the Centrifuge model because most of the work comes from Centrifuge with minor changes and clarifications. Centrifuge MIPs remain the truth regarding Centrifuge proposals.  Do you agree on the following model to implement RWA?  Please notice that it may not be the only model and it may not be the perfect model. If the community approve th…     Discussion on the DAI Hedging Issue     [Poll] RWA Working Group - Hedging DAI exchange rate for RWA Governance       Over the discussion on onboarding Real World Assets (RWA), there was discussion around the peg issue. Real world actors want to borrow in USD. We provide a funding in DAI. In our mind, DAI = USD but the last months have shown that it’s not exactly what is happening in the real world.  In a competitive landscape, having a currency exchange risk is the problem of the lender, not the borrower (as he wants to borrow USD not DAI).  Currently, the best idea seems to subsidize the currency risk by lowe…     Discussion on legal structures     [Discussion] Legal structures of MakerDAO Governance       Working on real world asset you quickly find yourself with legal contracts and KYC. Currently, MakerDAO and most DAO are dodging the issue. We have ways to continue to dodge it with RWA (by using Maker representatives for instance).  We don’t have a legal team yet, but that shouldn’t stop us from thinking.  In my understanding a DAO is a general partnership where MIPs and MKR tokens are the agreement and this forum a proof of existence. Each country has its own legal framework and “is a DAO a le…     Open discussion and Q&A form. See you there!
pretty sure the Passcode needs an edit @SebVentures .  edit: 966885 might work if the text doesn’t work.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
